title: Ukrainians protest in Kyiv ahead of Trump-Putin summit
description: Around 100 people rallied outside the US embassy in Kyiv on Friday to call for prisoner swaps rather than territory swaps ahead of the upcoming Trump-Putin summit. CNN’s Ben Wedeman reports.
content:
Around 100 people rallied outside the US embassy in Kyiv on Friday to call for prisoner swaps rather than territory swaps ahead of the upcoming Trump-Putin summit. CNN’s Ben Wedeman reports.

Dana White says the White House will 'definitely' host a UFC match UFC CEO Dana White told CBS that the White House will "definitely" host a UFC fight on July 4th, 2026. Last month, President Trump said he wanted to stage a UFC match at the White House with upwards of 20,000 people to celebrate 250 years of American independence. CNN's Andy Scholes reports. Dana White says the White House will 'definitely' host a UFC match

Smoke billows on the outskirts of Halifax as wildfire rages on Firefighters battled a wildfire on the outskirts of Halifax, Nova Scotia in Canada. According to Reuters, officials said the fire covered around 15 acres with some local businesses evacuating due to the fire. Smoke billows on the outskirts of Halifax as wildfire rages on

Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky is in Berlin for high-level talks with European leaders and President Trump, just days before Trump’s face-to-face meeting with Russian President Vladimir Putin in Alaska. The virtual meeting is seen as a strategic move to shape Trump’s stance ahead of the historic sit-down.

Dashcam video from the Mount Pleasant Police Department shows a lightning strike near an intersection in South Carolina. Hundreds lost power, and no injuries were reported, according to officials.

Baltimore’s mayor responds to Trump’s claims about his city Baltimore Mayor Brandon Scott (D) responded to President Donald Trump’s criticism about violence in his city by highlighting historic drops in violent crime. President Trump warned other major cities about federal intervention after he placed the Washington, DC, police department under federal control and deployed the National Guard. Baltimore’s mayor responds to Trump’s claims about his city

An explosion Monday at a US Steel coking plant near Pittsburgh has left people trapped under the rubble, with emergency workers on site trying to rescue them, an official said.

This city could be part of a Trump-Putin deal The city of Kramatorsk is at the frontline of Ukraine's war with Russia. The capital city of Donetsk, that Russia occupies, may play a part in upcoming talks between US President Donald Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin in Alaska on Friday. CNN's Chief Security Correspondent Nick Paton Walsh visits the city as Ukrainians arrive from Kyiv. This city could be part of a Trump-Putin deal
summary: The White House will definitely host a UFC match on July 4th, 2026, according to UFC CEO Dana White. This follows a rally outside the US embassy in Kyiv, Ukraine, calling for prisoner swaps rather than territory swaps ahead of the upcoming Trump-Putin summit. The Ukrainian President, Volodymyr Zelensky, is in Berlin for high-level talks with European leaders and President Trump, just days before his meeting with Russian President Vladimir Putin. An explosion at a US Steel coking plant near Pittsburgh has left people trapped under the rubble, with emergency workers trying to rescue them. The city of Kramatorsk, which is at the forefront of Ukraine's war with Russia, may play a part in upcoming talks between US President Donald Trump and Vladimir Putin in Alaska.
shortSummary: A Ukrainian protest over prisoner swaps and a wildfire in Halifax, Canada, highlights President Trump's commitment to a future UFC match in Washington.

argos_summary: Around 100 people rallied outside the US embassy in Kyiv demanding prisoner swaps ahead of the Trump‑Putin summit, while Dana White announced a UFC fight will be held at the White House on July 4, 2026. A wildfire burned about 15 acres on the outskirts of Halifax, Nova Scotia, prompting evacuations, and a lightning strike in South Carolina knocked out power but caused no injuries. Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky met European leaders in Berlin before the Alaska summit, and the city of Kramatorsk could play a role in the talks. Separately, Baltimore’s mayor defended the city against Trump’s criticism of violence, and an explosion at a US Steel plant near Pittsburgh trapped workers under rubble.
